sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.application.json_service" name="JSON Service request/response model" version="1.0.0" state="published" provider_name="ServiceNow" type="application">
<description> Core components and helpers for a JSON request/response model. Includes JSON and XML transports for NG and GlideAjax support. An extension of the processor framework. </description>
<extension point="com.snc.application.json_service" name="ServiceRequest" class="com.snc.application.json_service.impl.ServiceRequestImpl" /> <extension point="com.snc.application.json_service" name="ServiceResponse" class="com.snc.application.json_service.impl.ServiceResponseImpl" /> <extension point="com.snc.application.json_service" name="ServiceStatus" class="com.snc.application.json_service.impl.ServiceStatusImpl" /> <extension point="com.snc.application.json_service" name="List" class="com.snc.application.json_service.util.JSONSerializableArrayList" /> <extension point="com.snc.application.json_service" name="Map" class="com.snc.application.json_service.util.JSONSerializableHashMap" />
<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ServiceStatus" class="com.snc.application.json_service.script.ScriptableServiceStatus" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="JSONSerializableMap" class="com.snc.application.json_service.script.ScriptableJSONSerializableMap" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="JSONSerializableList" class="com.snc.application.json_service.script.ScriptableJSONSerializableList" /> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Core components and helpers for a JSON request/response model. Includes JSON and XML transports for NG and GlideAjax support. An extension of the processor framework.</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help/> <id>com.snc.application.json_service</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>JSON Service request/response model</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.application.json_service/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires/> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.application.json_service</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>false</trackable> <type>application</type> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
